about_the_game:
"DigRogue" is a single-player mining and combat roguelite 3D action game. As you level up through mining and battling, you'll gain various perks. The deeper you go, the more resources, treasures, and aliens you'll discover as you dig underground.

Mining Equipment
There are three types of equipment with distinct functions: the Pickaxe, Hammer, and Drilling Ball. Each piece of equipment, like the pickaxe, has unique skills that are randomly assigned. Keep digging to find the best gear that suits your build.

Combat Equipment
There are three types of weapons with unique abilities: the Handgun, Shotgun, and Machine Gun. Each weapon, such as the handgun, has its own unique skills that are randomly assigned. Keep digging to find the best weapon for your build.

Perks
The more you dig, the more perks you'll earn. From the three options, choose the one that best fits your strategy or seems the coolest, and aim to create your ultimate build.

Perks
The more you dig, the more perks you'll earn. From the three options, choose the one that best fits your strategy or seems the coolest, and aim to create your ultimate build.

name: DigRogue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 4130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: “DigRogue” is a solo-play mining 3D roguelite. Stranded on an unknown planet with minimal supplies, you must mine resources and gather enemy materials to upgrade your gear. Defeat the planet’s bosses, using their unique organs to upgrade your spaceship, and begin your long journey back to Earth.
